Tool

NameLine-Polygon Intersection
ID3
AuthorO. Conrad (c) 2010

Description

Line-polygon intersection.

Parameters

NameTypeIdentifierDescriptionConstraints
Input
Lines Shapes (input)LINES
Polygons Shapes (input)POLYGONS
Output
IntersectionShapes (output)INTERSECT
Options
OutputChoiceMETHODAvailable Choices: [0] one multi-line per polygon [1] keep original line attributes Default: 1
